title: Candace Owens Has A New Talk Show… And It’s Available Now On Daily Wire
description:
If you haven’t heard by now, conservative lightning rod Candace Owens has a new talk show named - you guessed it- CANDACE, and it’s available now at dailywire.com. You can catch key moments from the show on the podcast CANDACE which is available on Apple, Spotify, or anywhere else you listen. BUT in order to watch the full show, you must be a Daily Wire member. Go to dailywire.com/subscribe to get 25% off a new membership TODAY using code CANDACE. 
CANDACE on Apple Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/candace/id1556687660
CANDACE on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5we95mDQhkGC1rrQnMHQ3T?si=MjoLs0IfS5qGzxXCmFrc2g
CANDACE Full Show: https://utm.io/udcMK
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
